nile.desc: Dive into the vision of NILE with NFT art pieces.

lus.desc: Check out 264 pieces that connect viewers to nostalgic places in England.

tangled.desc: Tangled Timepieces is a web3 live community app where users can directly form new communities and communicate with one another.

ranking.title: Ranking
ranking.notice: Settled in order of the biggest number of transactions that occurred in a given period
ranking.notice2: Settled in order of the most expensive latest sale price

detailTop.resultMsg:
{{name}} wins auction
with a bid of <0>{{price}}</0><0>{{mark}}</0>
detailTop.saleFeatureMessage: 'Creating listing' feature will be available soon.
detailTop.offerFeatureMessage: 'Make Offer' feature will be available soon.

bottom.title: NFT is for Everyone
bottom.notice: NILE Marketplace is expanding into numerous new markets every day.

listing.title: Listing
listing.txt: When this piece is sold for the price above, you will be getting this much as profits for this sale, excluding the fees shown below.
listing.txt2: When registering a piece for sale, the Gas Fee shown below will occur.
listing.txt2-1: If you cancel or modify the registered sale, the Gas Fee shown below will occur.
listing.txt6: Gas Fee for Sale Registration: variable

snkrzInfo: The SNKRZ Details page will be available from November 17th.
creator: Rokkan Kim

collectionPage.title: London Underground Station(LUS) 264 Genesis
collectionPage.desc: Check out the collection of London Underground Stations(LUS) 264 Genesis that describes 264 London stations in Pixel art.

head.btn2: NFT Holder Benefits and Starting Bid Guide

collectionPage.noSearchKeyword: There are no search results for '{{keyword}}'.

bidResultPage.successDesc: Once the auction is over, you will be notified.
bidResultPage.cancelDesc: The canceled bid money has been returned to the Wallet.
bidResultPage.checkoutCompleteDesc: The NFT is available in your Wallet.
bidResultPage.refundDesc: Your bid has been safely returned.

retractingTooltip:
이전 입찰 내역을 취소할 수 있습니다. 
취소 시 Gas Fee가 발생합니다.
dontGetOfferTooltip: 판매를 위해 Listing하지 않더라도, 내가 보유한 NFT에 관심이 있는 사용자가 자유롭게 가격을 제안할 수 있습니다. 가격 제안을 받고 싶지 않다면 미판매 상태로 변경해 주세요. 상태 변경 시 Gas Fee를 지불해야 합니다.
getOfferTooltip: 가격 제안을 받고 싶다면 Open for Offers 상태로 변경해 주세요. 판매를 위해 Listing하지 않더라도, 내가 보유한 NFT에 관심이 있는 사용자가 자유롭게 가격을 제안할 수 있게 됩니다. 상태 변경 시 Gas Fee를 지불해야 합니다.

waitingForListing.title: Registering NFT for Sale…
waitingForListing.desc:
Marketplace NFT registration has been requested, 
and transaction will be activated soon.

successfully.title: NFT Registered for Sale!
successfully.desc: NFT successfully registered for sale in the Marketplace.

resultEdit.title: NFT Re-registered for Sale!
resultEdit.desc: NFT successfully re-registered for sale in the Marketplace.

resultCancel.title: NFT Sale Canceled!
resultCancel.desc: NFT sale successfully canceled in the Marketplace.

resultChangeNotForSale.title: Status changed!
resultChangeNotForSale.desc: NFT status successfully changed to 'Not for Sale'.

resultAccept.title: Sale complete!
resultAccept.desc: Congratulations. Your NFT has been successfully sold at a good price.

resultChange.title: Status Changed!
resultChange.desc: NFT status successfully changed to 'Open for Offers'.
